Class Description

An animation builder for any type to create an animation model.

A helper to read animation data and construct an animation from it.

Represents the abstracted shape.
ASynchronisedActionSet
Represents an abstract implementation of a synchronized action.
ChangeColor
Represents a change of color for any IShape.
ChangeDimension
Represents a change of state (position) for any given object.
ChangePosition
Represents a new changer of location command to be applied to any IShape.
Color
To represent color.
ControllerImpl
This represents an instance of our controller.
Dimension
To represent a two-dimensional space.
IActionCommand
To represent a single action (or mutation) that can be performed on a shape of type IShape.
IAnimationModel
Represents an instance of a single animation that is a collection of actions performed on shapes of type IShape.
IControllerFeatures
Represents all of the different actions and controls that a controller supports.
IGraphicsEdit
An interface to represent the public commands that are involved in re-painting the animations.

A read-only version of the model.
IShape
To represent a two-dimensional shape.
ISynchronisedActionSet
Represents an interface of a synchronized action.

The interface for our view class.
